name: Mini Chrysoprase Stud Earrings in 14k Gold
description:
...galactic goodness for listless lobes...
 
Sweet green Chrysoprase stones are set in 14k yellow gold...easy peasy pop of color...
 
Stones measure 4mm, or 1/8".
 
Composed entirely of 14k solid gold, including the ear nuts.

name: ARTEMIS SS and 18k Gold Shield Necklace with Emerald
description:
...a tiny shield for tiny battles...
 
The ARTEMIS necklace is composed of a 1" sterling silver shield, domed with a hammered finish, hanging from an 18k gold loop, and embellished with a 5mm Emerald cabochon nestled in 18k gold.
 
Hangs from a sterling silver cable chain.
 
The entire piece has been finished with a dark patina.
 
Emerald is the birthstone for the month of May.

name: Pebble Ring Sterling Silver & 14k Gold Wide Band Ring
description:
The Pebble ring is built from sterling silver and is embellised with three 14k solid gold pebbles. The ring measures 5/8" wide.

Wide band rings will fit more snugly than thinner rings. Please order one full size larger than you normally wear.

Hallmarked .925/14k on the inside.

UK Ring Size Conversion:

UK/US
J/5
K/5.5
L/6
M/6.5
N/7
O/7.5
P/8
Q/8.5
R/9
S/9.5
T/10
U/10.5
V/11

name: HASTI Prehnite Gemstone Necklace 18k Gold and Sterling Silver Granulation
description: ..plump and mossy green...a perky procession of micro-faceted prehnite rondelles...hand-knotted on pale green silk for a look that is earthy yet refined...my handmade sterling silver and 18k solid gold granulation pendant adds just a touch of Medieval feel...closes with a sterling s-clasp and measures 17" long....

name: Double Labradorite Pendant Sterling Silver Lariat Necklace
description:
Minimal and modern,  a take on the traditional lariat.
 
Hanging from the ends of the sterling silver chain are two faceted briolettes of blue-flash Labradorite. The chain measures 17.5" with an extension chain that allows for lengths up to 19".
 
Fits right in to any edgy collection.
 
Hallmarked .925

name: VIRTUE Sterling Silver Endless Hoop Earrings
description:
...slip into outrageous ovals...
 
  
...thick sterling silver wire has been hand-forged into endless hoops...
 
...polished to a buttery soft shine...
 
...impossibly lightweight and perfect for everyday wear...
 
...width is 1-1/4" and length is 2"...


Stone feather was painted by the incomparably divine Kelly Clark at UmberDove Studios.

name: Fanta Orange Mandarin Garnet Sterling Silver Set of Stacking Rings
description:
...citrus hues in a stacking presentation...
 
...this set includes three rings: one ring with a 1.85ct (6mm x 7mm) rose-cut Mandarin Spessarite Garnet in the highly-coveted Fanta Orange shade, set into sterling silver and perched atop a 2.5mm wide sterling silver band. The second and third rings are twisted sterling bands. All rings stacked together will fit a size 7 finger. 
 
All sterling silver elements.
 
Buffed and polished to a brilliant shine.

name: Gold and Black 14k Solid Gold Pebble Necklace on Blackened Sterling Chain
description:
There's nothing quite like holding a little nugget of gold in your hand...
 
A solid 14k gold pebble measuring 7x9x4mm hangs from a 17" blackened sterling chain.
 
The pebble garners a nice weight, is smooth to the touch, and is finished with a bright polish.

name: WISHBONE Sterling Silver 14k Gold Wishbone Cuff Bracelet
description:
Robert Frost wrote, "A person will sometimes devote all his life to the development of one part of his body--the wishbone." Well, I've got you covered. You are now free to develop the other two more important bones...your backbone and your funny bone. 
 
The WISHBONE cuff measures 1/2" wide. Finished with a hammered texture and a solid 14k gold wishbone. I gave it a solid black patina to contrast against the gold. 

Metal was left with some give so it is easy to get on and off, but work hardened so it will retain its shape. Built for wrist sizes up to 7".

name: Welo Opal Sterling Silver and 18k Gold Gemstone Necklace
description:
This one-of-a-kind beauty boasts two super-flashy Welo Opal cabochons, 3.86 total carats.
 
Spectacular color play...brilliant and bright with flashes of red, orange, green, and blue...one oval, one pear-shaped...set into sterling silver with 18k solid gold accents.

Pendant measures just over 1" long and 1/3" wide.
 
Hangs from a 17" sterling silver chain and closes with my handmade clasp...polished to a shiny finish.
 
Made from scratch. Built to hand down. Hallmarked 18k and .925 (sterling silver) and my maker's mark on the backside.
 
Welo Opals are from Ethiopia...mesmerizing like no other opal.
 
October birthstone

name: 14k & 18k Solid Gold Simple Stem Dangle Earrings
description:
...sleek modern swingers for gold digging divas...
 
Classic but modern...simple tapered stems of solid 14k gold drop 1" from solid 18k gold handmade french ear wires.
 
The stems measure approximately 1" in length and 3mm at their widest point.
 
Bright polish finish.

name: Fanta Orange Mandarin Garnet Sterling Silver 18k Gold Stacking Rings
description:
...citrus hues in a stacking presentation... 
 
...this set includes two rings: one ring with a 2.19ct (8mm x 7mm) rose-cut Mandarin Spessarite Garnet in the highly-coveted Fanta Orange shade, set into 18k gold and perched atop a 2.5mm wide sterling silver band. The second ring is a matching sterling band with 18k gold granulation accents. Both rings are size 7.  
 
All sterling and solid gold elements.
  
Buffed and polished to a brilliant shine.

name: Medieval Princess Ring 14k Solid Gold Rose Cut Aquamarine Ring
description:
The Medieval Princess Ring is composed of 14k & 18k solid gold, and a 1.62ct rose-cut Aquamarine, shaded in a divine sky blue hue.
 
 
 
Sits atop a size 7 band.
 
All solid gold components.
 
100% handcrafted.
 
Built to last.
 
Aquamarine is a March birthstone.

name: Sweet Little Welo Opal Ring in Sterling Silver
description:
...sweet little opal in all its earthly delight...
 
...set simply into sterling silver, a Welo Opal measuring 9mm x 7mm, boasts brilliant color play with flashes of red and orange, green and blue...an incredible stone! Perched atop a sterling band and polished to a bright shiny finish...
 
Made to order in any size.
 
Welo Opals are from Ethiopia...mesmerizing like no other opal... 
 
October birthstone.

name: Welo Opal Cocktail Statement Ring in 14k Gold
description:
Super flashy oval Welo Opal cabochon, 3cts, spectacular color play in a patchwork Harlequin pattern...brilliant and bright with flashes of red and orange, green, blue, and purple...set into solid 14k yellow gold. No tiny stone--this ring will absolutely make a statement! 
  
Made from scratch. Built to hand down.

Hallmarked 14k.

Allow 3 weeks fabrication time.

This item will ship USPS Priority Insured, Signature required.
Free shipping within US.
Int'l shipping is $45. 


***Due to the fluctuating cost of gold, discount codes may not be applied toward the purchase of this ring*** 
 
Welo Opals are from Ethiopia...mesmerizing like no other opal!
 
October birthstone.

name: ALICE Sterling Silver 18k Gold Petite Oval Earrings Hand-Engraved with Thoreau Quote
description:
"It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see."
  
Petite 11x6mm oval sterling tabs are hand-engraved with words from Henry David Thoreau...a soulful, gentle reminder.
 
The tabs hang from my hand-forged 18k solid gold french hooks and have been polished to a bright shiny finish.
 
Each pair is made to order. Allow for slight variations.

name: MELISSA Sterling Silver 18k Gold Petite Earrings Hand-Engraved with Rilke Quote
description:
"The only journey is the one within"
 
Petite 9mm round sterling tabs are hand-engraved with a quote from Rainer Maria Rilke...a soulful, gentle reminder.
 
The hand engraving is featured on the front of the earrings.
 
The tabs hang from my hand-forged 18k solid gold french hooks and have been polished to a bright shiny finish.


Each pair is made to order. Allow for slight variations.

name: Citrine Gemstone Necklace Sterling & 18k Gold
description:
A rose-cut 12.75ct pear-shaped Citrine packing serious sparkle to light up even the most dreary decolletage.
Nestled in sterling silver with 18k gold accents in my signature pocket watch style setting.
The back plate was left open to let the light come through.
Pendant drop including both loops measures 1.25".
Hangs from an 18" sterling silver chain that closes with my handmade 18k gold clasp and loops.

Hallmarked and built to last.
One of a kind.

name: Welo Opal and Sapphire Necklace in Sterling Silver
description:
Modern classic...an oval Welo Opal cabcohon, 2cts, brilliant color play with flashes of red and orange, green and blue...paired with a cobalt blue Sapphire...both set into sterling silver...hanging on a sterling chain that closes with my handmade clasp...polished to a buttery soft shine...the length of the pendant from top loop to the very bottom is just a shot under 1"...scintillant swinginess...

Also shown with Peridot. Inquire about additional gemstone pairings.
 
Welo Opals are from Ethiopia...mesmerizing like no other opal. 
 

Made to order, allow 3 weeks.

name: 14k Gold and Sterling Hand-Engraved Necklace with Louisa May Alcott Quote
description:
"I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship."
--Louisa May Alcott
 
A 1" x 3/4" sterling freeform tab is hand-engraved with a quote from Louisa May Alcott "I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship"...a soulful, gentle reminder to hold yourself in tenderness.
 
The engraved pendant is shadowed with a solid 14k gold pendant with the same freeform cut.
 
The pendants hang by a 14k solid gold loop on a sterling cable chain that has been finished with a soft gray patina, followed by a brush polish.
 
All sterling and solid gold elements.
 
Built to last.
 
Balanced.

Allow 2 weeks fabrication time.

name: Royston Ribbon Turquoise Hand-Engraved Cluster Necklace
description:
"Respond to every call that excites your spirit." --Rumi
 
A 9ct. Oscar Wehrand Royston Ribbon Turquoise cabochon measuring 15mmx15mm is set into sterling silver and complemented with a tear-drop shaped briolette of robin-egg blue Amazonite. On oval sterling tab is engraved with words from Rumi: "Respond to every call that excites your spirit."
 

The cluster measures 2-1/2" long and hangs from an 18" chain.
 
All sterling elements.
 
Hallmarked .925 (sterling) on the backside.

name: FIG Sterling Silver 14k Gold Hoop Earrings
description:
...a slip of circular serendipity...
 
...sterling silver offset hoops embellished with 14k gold orbs, asymmetrically placed...articulated at the earwire for movement...
 
...hoops measure 1"...
 
..built to last...

name: Sterling Silver Blue Sapphire Necklace Walt Whitman Quote
description:
a small reminder... 
meant to be worn in that precious space between your heart and your voice...
 
Composed of sterling silver and Sapphire...an oval 10mm deep-blue Sapphire cabochon accompanies a freeform sterling tab engraved with the words of Walt Whitman, "Whatever satisfies the soul is truth"...hangs from an 18" chain and closes with a handmade clasp...pendant is 3/4" long.
 
All sterling elements.
 
Built to last.

name: Garnet and Sterling Bracelet with Engraved Tab "The heart does not choose"
description:
...essential and timeless wrist adornment...
 
...beautiful on its own, or layered with other bracelets...
   
...a plump procession of gorgeous garnet micro-faceted rondelles...a delicate sterling oval tag engraved with the words "The heart does not choose"...strung securely on professional jeweler's flex wire...secured with a sterling s-clasp...beads measure 3mm...bracelet is a standard 7"...
  
 
Garnet is the birthstone for folks born in January.

name: Sterling Silver Peach Keishi Pearl Ring
description:
Lustrous, freeform peach-hued Keishi pearl set into sterling silver and perched upon a 2.5mm wide sterling band. The Keishi Pearl measures roughly 10mm x 9mm. Polished to a bright shiny finish.

This ring is a size 6.5 (US) or M (UK)

Built to last.

Hallmarked .925 (sterling silver) on the inside of the band.

name: Ophelia Welo Opal Necklace Sterling and Gold
description:
The Ophelia necklace: Welo Opal, brushed and texturized sterling, 14k & 18k gold. Measures about 2" in diameter and hangs from a sterling snake chain.

Garners a nice comfortable weight. Solid. Textural. 

Eyes will be caught.

Made to order. Expect slight variations.

Allow 2 weeks fabrication time.

name: Welo Opal Sterling Silver and 14k Gold Lotus Necklace
description:
...three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth...Buddha
 
Super flashy lotus-shaped Welo Opal cabochon, 1.5cts, spectacular color play...brilliant and bright with flashes of red, orange, green, and blue...set into solid 14k yellow gold bezel onto a sterling silver base...dangles below a 14k gold loop for scintillant swinginess. Total pendant drop, including the three silver loops is 1.5"...hangs from an 18" sterling silver chain and closes with my handmade clasp...polished to a shiny finish.
 
Made from scratch. Built to hand down.
 
Hallmarked 14k and .925 (sterling silver) and my maker's mark on the backside.


Welo Opals are from Ethiopia...mesmerizing like no other opal...they are "hydrophane opals" which is to say they are porous and if submerged in water for an extended period of time, some become transparent. Once they dry out, their color returns. Fascinating stone!
 
October birthstone.

Made to order. 

Allow 2 weeks fabrication time.

name: TREASURES Sterling Silver Blue Flash Rainbow Moonstone Necklace with Engraved Pebble
description:
"I have just three things to teach: simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures. Simple in actions and in thoughts, you return to the source of being. Patient with both friends and enemies, you accord with the way things are. Compassionate toward yourself, you reconcile all beings in the world." --Lao Tzu

 

The TREASURES necklace is built from scratch of sterling silver and micro-faceted blue-flash Rainbow Moonstone rondelles.

The organically shaped sterling pebble is hand-formed and smooth to the touch, with a soft matte finish. 

The front side is engraved with "simplicity patience compassion" and the back side is engraved with "Lao Tzu .925"

The pendant measures 1" long and 1/2" at its widest point. Total pendant drop with three stones is 2".

The sterling and moonstone chain measures 18.5" long and closes with my hand-forged clasp.

name: Sterling Silver and 14k Gold Green Variscite Long Earrings
description:
Hand-crafted simple, elegant earrings. Made 100% from scratch of sterling silver, 14k gold, and Variscite.

Smooth 18mm soothing green Variscite marquise briolettes dangle freely from articulated joints for a bit of swingtacular serendipity.

Wee 14k gold beads are tucked in just above the briolettes.

Length is 2" from the bottom of the earwire. 

Brush-finished then polished to a buttery soft shine.

Built to last.

name: Sterling Silver Labradorite Long Earrings
description:
Hand-crafted simple, elegant earrings. Made 100% from scratch of sterling silver and blue-flash Labradorite.

Smooth 13mm Labradorite briolettes dangle freely from articulated joints for a bit of swingtacular serendipity.

Length is 2-1/2" from the bottom of the earwire. 

Brush-finished then polished to a buttery soft shine.

Built to last.

name: Sterling Silver and 14k Gold Hand-Engraved Necklace "My soul will find yours"
description:
Built from scratch of sterling silver and 14k gold. The 14k gold bar is engraved with, "My soul will find yours". Hallmarked on the backside with .925, 14k, and my maker's mark. Hangs from a sterling silver chain and closes with my handmade clasp.

Built to last.

name: NOMAD Green Turquoise Sterling Silver Necklace
description:
...extreme earthy elegance...


...the NOMAD necklace is composed of a substantial and gorgeous cabochon of green spiderweb turquoise, bustling black matrix running through...set into a hand-forged sterling silver bezel and embellished with my trademark punch of gold...an 18k gold disk...all sterling elements...pendant measures just a shot over 1.5" long and 3/4" at the widest point...oxidized and polished to a buttery satin finish...hangs on an 18" sterling cable chain that closes with my handmade clasp...

name: Woof! Reserved for Ms. Moreland
description:
Dog Paw necklace to match your ring  :)

Thank you, my dear!

name: Sterling Silver & 14k Gold Petite Dog Paw Necklace
description:
...unleash the hounds... 

...my own bark-worthy trinket...a petite 1/2" x 1/2" sterling silver paw is embellished with 14k solid gold pads...

...all this canine love hangs from a sterling silver cable chain that closes with my handmade clasp...polished to a buttery soft shine.... 

Built to last.

Made to order. Allow for slight variation.

name: Sterling Silver 14k Gold Amazonite Necklace
description: Hand-fabricated from sterling silver and 14k gold. A sea-blue tear drop shaped Amazonite cabochon is set into sterling silver and embellished with three 14k gold dots. Hangs from the 14k tip of a sterling spiral and a 14k gold stem. The pendant measures 3" long and hangs on an 18" sterling silver chain. Polished to a bright shiny finish.

name: Sterling Silver and 14k Gold Smoky Quartz Earrings
description:
Hand-crafted simple, elegant earrings. Made 100% from scratch of sterling silver, 14k gold, and Smoky Quartz.

Faceted 15mm Smoky Quartz briolettes are embellsihed with 14k gold randomly dotted stems below fixed sterling earwires.

Length is 1" from the bottom of the earwire. 

Brush-finished then polished to a buttery soft shine.

Built to last.

name: FILIBUSTER Sterling Silver & 18k Gold Wide Saddle Ring
description:
The Filibuster Saddle Ring...inspired by badass Texas Senator Wendy Davis...this ring is epic and haute.
 
Composed entirely of sterling silver with a single freckle of 18k gold...sawn from heavy-gauge sterling sheet, wrapped, soldered, hammered, sanded, buffed, and polished...lots of texture with a center of roped and dotted bands....darkened to highlight the details.
 
This ring garners a nice weight and will fit a size 8-8.5 comfortably...widest point is just a shot over 1" (tapering to 1/2" on the backside)...I have quite possibly the shortest fingers ever and this ring hits me just past the knuckle.
 
Polished to a bright shiny finish...hallmarked .925 on the inside along with my maker's mark.
 
Textural, elegant, symbolic.

name: Sterling Silver 14k Gold Keishi Pearl Abstract Cocktail Ring
description:
This abstract cocktail ring is composed of sterling silver, 14k gold, and one 18mm freeform Keishi pearl.

Set into a sterling silver open frame and embellished with three 14k gold heat-induced orbs.

The band measures 4mmx2mm and is a size 7.5.

100% handmade.

Built to last.

name: SEED POD Sterling Silver Dangle Earrings
description:
The Seed Pod earrings are hand-crafted simple, elegant earrings. Made 100% from scratch of sterling silver.
 
Thick hand-pierced sterling "pods" dangle freely for a bit of linear serendipity.
 
Length is 2-3/4" from the bottom of the earwire. Pods are just shy of 3/4".
 
Brush-finished then polished to a buttery soft shine.
 
Built to last.

Stone Feather is painted by the incomparably divine Kelly Clark at UmberDove Studios.

name: Abstract Sterling Silver and 14k Gold Wide Textured Ring
description:
...finery for your fingers...
 

...an abstract ring composed of sterling silver and 14k gold...sawn from sterling and solid gold sheet...hammer-textured and embellished with gold dots...garners a nice weight and is a size 6.5...widest point is just a shot under 1/2"...finished with a light gray patina followed by a brush polish to highlight the details....
 
 
 
...hallmarked .925 and 14k on the inside...

name: TINY MIGHTY Sterling Silver and 14k Gold Petite Earrings
description:
The TINY MIGHTY earrings are sassy smidgens of golden goodness

14k solid gold heat-induced orbs are forged and shaped into wee disks then soldered to the end of heavy gauge sterling wire which is then fabricated by hand into french hooks. Ultra petite.

Polished to a bright shiny finish and built to last.

Hallmarked 14k and .925

Lightweight, easy to wear.

Each pair is made to order. Allow for slight variations.

Thank you!

name: TINY LOTUS 14k Solid Gold Earrings with Blackened Sterling Lotus Pods
description:
Hand-forged 14k solid gold french hooks are adorned with 7mm blackened serling silver lotus-shaped pods...petite, elegant everyday essential.

-hallmarked 14k-

name: Sterling Silver and Rainbow Moonstone Engraved Necklace "I spin worlds..."
description:
Built from scratch of sterling silver, this stardust-textured sterling charm set is engraved with, I spin worlds where we could be together. I dream you. For me, imagination and desire are very close. from author Jeanette Winterson. The engraving is spread across all three rectangular tabs and is embellished with a plump micro-faceted blue-flash Rainbow Moonstone rondelle. Hangs from an 18" sterling silver chain and closes with my handmade clasp. Pendant measures 1" x 3/8".
 
Built to last.

name: Wicked Pixies 14k Solid Gold Earrings with Blackened Sterling Silver Spike
description:
Hand-forged 14k solid gold french hooks are adorned with 8mm blackened serling silver spikes...petite, elegant everyday essential.
 
  


-wicked pixies is my signature line of rustic hooks bedecked with beguiling elements-
 
-beautifully organic-
 
-unpretentious-
 
-built to last-

name: DEBAUCHERY Sterling Silver Green or Blue Eyeball Ring
description:
Decadent Debauchery

 
The Debauchery Eyeball Ring is composed of sterling silver and a 14mm glass taxidermy eye....an innocent green or blue version of the evil eye, unblinking, standing watch.
Made for a woman with quirky intent who can appreciate that people are just generally nicer to you when you're wearing body parts bezel-set into silver. Good call, people. Good call.

Polished to a bright shiny finish.
My maker's mark and .925 Sterling hallmark are on the backside so you know who's responsible.

UK Ring Size Conversion:

UK/US
J/5
K/5.5
L/6
M/6.5
N/7
O/7.5
P/8
Q/8.5

S/9.5
T/10
U/10.5
V/11

name: GLIMMER Sterling Silver Hammered Heavy Bangle Bracelet
description:
...a circular slip of silver sunshine...



The Glimmer Bangle is composed of sterling silver. Hand forged by me from 8g sterling stock (3.5mm wide) and given an earthy hammered texture for an organic feel. It garners a nice weight and is built to a standard medium bangle size of 2.5" interior diameter and polished to a bright shiny finish. 



Hallmarked .925 on the inside.

name: Sterling Silver Simple Classic 14k Gold Circle Necklace
description:
...balance....

...one 14k solid gold 1/2" circle is connected to sterling silver chain in a continuous line...very feminine, very simple...will rest gently upon your collarbone...total length is just a shot over 17" and closes with my handmade clasp...
 
...built to last...

name: 14k Solid Gold Hand-Pierced Butterfly Wing Necklace
description:
...fluttering finery for a finicky decolletage...
 
My 1" x 1/2" butterfly wing is hand-cut from solid 14k gold. 

Made for the girl who is sitting on the edge of possibility. The flower needs no reminder of what comes next, but sometimes we do. Preserved in metal, a reminder to look into the sun, open up, and become as beautiful as you know you are.
 
Hangs from a 14k gold cable chain.
 
Wear it well, my friend.

name: Sterling Silver & 14k Gold Moss Aquamarine Necklace Hand-Engraved with Rumi
description:
...to alight that space between your voice and your heart...
  
An 18" chain of hand-wrapped sterling silver and micro-faceted Moss Aquamarine rondelles are accented with a 14k gold ring and a rectangular sterling tab hand-engraved with the words of Rumi: 

"There is some kiss we want with our whole lives. It is the touch of the spirit upon the body."
  
Closes with my hand-forged sterling clasp...total pendant drop is just a shot over 1". 
 
You are lovely. More lovely than you can ever imagine.

name: Petite Pebbles 14k Gold Freeform Post Earrings
description:
...galactic goodness for lackluster lobes...
 
Tiny heat-induced 14k solid gold orbs make for sweet organically-shaped pebble stud earrings.
 
They measure 5mm across at their widest point, and are fitted with sterling silver posts and clutches.
 
The gold has been given a soft satin finish.
 
Built to last.

name: Sterling Silver and 14k Gold Simple Charm Necklace Hand-Engraved with "Joy"
description:
...decidedly delicate...
 
...a 5mm freeform round solid 14k gold drop is hand-engraved with the word "joy"....
 
...hangs from a 16" sterling chain and loop...
 
...hallmarked 14k on the backside...
 
...built to last...

(let me know if you'd like a longer chain at no charge)

name: Sterling Silver Moss Aquamarine Bracelet Hand Engraved Gandhi Quote
description:
"In a gentle way, you can shake the world." 
~Gandhi
 
 
 
This simple bracelet is built of sterling silver and moss aquamarine. Gorgeous 3mm micro-faceted sea-green shades mottled with trace iron elements. A small round charm is hand-engraved with the words "In a gentle way, you can shake the world" from Gandhi. Closes with my handmade clasp and measures 7.25".

name: SAPPHO Sterling Silver Lambda Necklace
description:
The SAPPHO necklace is bold and beguiling homage to LGBTQ symbolism, hand-fabricated from sterling silver and fire...sawn, shaped, soldered, hammered, filed, polishednot cast from a mold. 

The Lambda pendant is 1" long. 

All sterling elementsbrush polished to a satin shine. 
Hangs on a sterling cable chain that measures 18 long. 

Built from scratch to withstand even the most stalwart of Pride warriors.

Free shipping worldwide.

The "Lambda" is a well-recognized symbol of pride adopted by the Gay Activists Alliance of New York in 1970, representing unity and the light of knowledge shed into the darkness of ignorance.

name: MICHELLE Sterling Silver Petite Rectangular Earrings Engraved with Katherine Hepburn Quote
description:
"If you obey all the rules, you miss all the fun"
 
 
 
Petite 7x10mm rectangular sterling tabs are hand-engraved with a quote from Katherine Hepburn...a wise reminder, indeed.
 
The hand engraving is featured on the front of the earrings.
 
The earrings hang from my hand-forged sterling french hooks and have been polished to a satin finish.
 
All sterling elements.
 
Each pair is made to order. Allow for slight variations.

Stone Feather is painted by the incomparably divine Kelly Clark at UmberDove Studios.

name: FRECKLES Sterling Silver Stacking Ring
description:
"Four of the things I'd have been better without: love, curiosity, freckles, and doubt."
-Dorothy Parker
 
I couldn't agree more, Ms. Parker, but some people just seem to like them, even going so far as to have them tattooed onto their body. Rings, girls...rings are the answer...a single freckled ring or a entire stack of them...much easier to remove should you have a change of heart about those darn freckles. 
 
...heavy-gauge 2mm-wide sterling silver is hand-forged into bands, soldered, hammered, and given little divot freckles...oxidised and followed up with a brush polish so the freckles stay dark and the bands stay shiny...this listing is for a single sterling silver ring that will be made to fit your finger...please use the drop-down box to choose size...if you'd like to buy more than one ring, simply add more of the same item to your shopping cart...shiny happy polka dots....

Made to order. Please allow 5 days for fabrication.


Free shipping--worldwide.

name: Sterling Silver 14k Gold Long Mehndi Necklace Engraved with Ralph Waldo Emerson Quote
description:
A sterling silver Mehndi-inspired freeform tab is hammer finished and engraved with a quote from Ralph Waldo Emerson: "We acquire the strength we have overcome."
 
 
 
The pendant measures 1-3/4" long and 1" wide. It's embellished with solid 14k gold accents and garners a nice comfortable weight.
 
 
 
Hangs from a 32" sultry sterling chain that has been finished with a soft gray patina followed by a brush polishing to bring out the detail. Closes with my handmade clasp.
 
 
 
Built from scratch. Made to last.

name: Wicked Pixies--Sterling Silver & 18k Gold Long Earrings with Tanzanite
description:
...wicked pixies...calming lobal anxiety... 
 
Posh and plump violet-hued Tanzanite rondelle beads...18k solid gold drops at the end...all swaying serenely below my hand-forged sterling hooks for a bit of linear serendipity...length is just over 2.5" from the bottom of the hook...finished with a dark gray patina.
 
  
-wicked pixies is my signature line of rustic hooks bedecked with beguiling gems-
 
-beautifully organic-
 
-unpretentious-
 
-built to last-

name: VARESE Sterling Silver, 14k Gold, Brazilian Emerald Necklace Engraved Quote
description:
"...women, brave as stars at dawn." --Edwidge Danticat
 
A 1-1/4" long sterling oval is hand-engraved with the words of Edwidge Danticat: "...women, brave as stars at dawn"...a soulful, gentle reminder to hold your own fierce heart in tenderness.
 
Embellished with a gorgeous 1.00ct green-blue hued Emerald briolette from the Itatiaia mine in Brazil (natural, untreated Emerald) that hangs from 14k gold wire.
 
19" sterling cable chain closes with my handmade clasp and has been finished with a soft gray patina, followed by a brush polish.
 
Hallmarked 14k and .925 (sterling) on the backside.

name: FULCRUM Sterling Silver Articulated Spiral Earrings
description:
...heavy metal meets drama queen...

The FULCRUM earrings are hand-crafted architectural swingers. Made 100% from scratch of sterling silver.

Thick-gauge spirals affixed to the end of articulated joints provide a bit of swing and linear serendipity.

Length is 2-3/4" from the TOP of the earwire. Spirals are 1/2" round.

Finished with a scratch texture then polished to a buttery soft shine.

Built to last.

name: Sterling Silver Hoop Necklace Peridot Engraved with Ralph Waldo Emerson Quote
description:
...freeform fandango of haute hoops...
 
A run of sterling loops have been cut, formed, soldered, pounded, buffed, polished, oxidised...the heavy-gauge focal loop is hand-engraved with the words, "...plunge into the sublime seas..." by Ralph Waldo Emerson. "Emerson" is engraved on the backside. Adorned with three gorgeous rondelles of Peridot. This possy rides side saddle on a single chain and measures 20" in total length. Closes with my handforged S clasp.
Happy circles.

Each necklace is made to order. Allow for slight variations.
 
Full Emerson quote:
"Be not the slave of your own past...plunge into the sublime seas, dive deep, and swim far, so you shall come back with self-respect, with new power, with an advanced experience, that shall explain and overlook the old."

name: SACRED Sterling Silver Carnelian Bracelet Engraved Edna St. Vincent Millay
description:
...a slip of summertime hues for your lovely wrist...
 
...SACRED is a multi-strand bracelet composed of a 5/8" domed sterling tab that is hand-engraved on the front and back with the words of Edna St.Vincent Millay: "I know I am but summer to your heart, and not the full four seasons of the year"...a finely faceted briolette of tangerine-hued Carnelian dangles next to the tab...closes with my handmade sterling hook...all sterling elements...built from scratch...built to last...fits a 7" wrist...

name: JOAN OF ARC Sterling Silver 14k Gold Blue Diamond Dagger Necklace
description:
...matriarchal cultures, butterfly out of the chrysalis, scepter of ancient goddesses...whatever the symbolism--own your warrior side and look fierce doing it, sister.
 
 
JOAN OF ARC is a bold and beguiling dagger hand-forged from sterling silver, solid gold and fire: sawn, hammered, shaped, filed, solderedmeticulously pieced together. Not cast from a mold, so it is one of a kind. Embellished with a blue diamond set into the blade.
 
It measures 1- long from the tip of the blade to the top of the handle.
 
All sterling and 14k solid gold elementsfinished with a soft gray patina to highlight the details and brush polished to a satin shine.
Hangs on a sterling cable chain that measures 18 long and closes with a handmade hook.
 
Built from scratch to withstand even the most stalwart of women warriors.

Free shipping--worldwide.

name: Petite Moonstone Earrings Sterling Silver and 18k Gold
description:
...compact glamour...
  
...I've fabricated heavy-gauge sterling hooks and adorned them with 6mm blue flash Rainbow Moonstone micro-faceted rondelles...shades of wintry iridescence wrapped in 18k solid gold wire...a spritely 1/2" in length...polished to a buttery soft shine.

name: PAPER MOON Sterling Silver Blue Topaz Ring
description:
...simply cerulean in a straightforward presentation...
 
 
One gorgeous 7x12mm tavernier-cut matte finished Blue Topaz is set simply and cleanly onto a hammered sterling silver band...this ring is a size 7...all sterling elements.
 
 
 
...polished to a buttery soft shine...
 
...built to last...

name: Sterling Silver and 14k Gold Ruby Stacking Ring
description:
...wear alone or stacked with other fabulous rings...
 
 
 
...a blood-red 7mm oval Ruby cabochon is set into a solid 14k Gold bezel and set upon a substantial sterling silver band in a savvy size 5.5 (UK size K)...all sterling and solid gold elements and hallmarked as such...polished to a bright shiny finish.
 
 
 
handcrafted. built to last.

name: FAITH OF AFRICA Sterling Silver Giraffe Brooch with Pink Rhodolite Garnet
description:
...faith is seeing how Africa's people can have trust in each step, making a path forward and believing that the best is still in front of them....




The Faith of Africa brooch is composed entirely of sterling silver. My giraffe is sawn from heavy-gauge sterling sheet and measures 2.75" long and 1" at its widest point. She is embellished with a 3mm pink Rhodolite Garnet at the tip of her toe. It has been oxidised and given a satin finish. It boasts a traditional pin catch on the backside, as well as my maker's mark and a .925 Sterling hallmark.




Built from scratch and made to last a lifetime.

name: JOAN OF ARC Sterling Silver Sapphire Dagger Necklace
description:
...matriarchal cultures, butterfly out of the chrysalis, scepter of ancient goddesses...whatever the symbolism--own your warrior side and look fierce doing it, sister.
 
 
JOAN OF ARC is a bold and beguiling dagger hand-forged from sterling silver and fire: sawn, hammered, shaped, filed, solderedmeticulously pieced together. Not cast from a mold, so it is one of a kind. Embellished with two rose-cut yellow sapphires tucked below the crossguard.
 
It measures 1- long from the tip of the blade to the top of the handle.
 
All sterling elementsfinished with a soft gray patina to highlight the details and brush polished to a satin shine.
Hangs on a sterling cable chain that measures 18 long and closes with a handmade hook.
 
Built from scratch to withstand even the most stalwart of women warriors.

Free shipping--worldwide.

name: BRAVE Sterling Silver and Copper Necklace with Hand Engraved Quote Maya Angelou
description:
...sinous slab of warm copper coaxed into a freeform shape...

...2-1/4" by 1" hand-engraved with the powerful words of Maya Angelou:

"Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope."

...hangs from an 18" sterling chain and closes with my handmade clasp...

...all sterling and copper elements, built to last...

name: Watermelon Tourmaline Slice Necklace in Sterling Silver
description:
...my absolute favorite stone...green on the outside and pink on the inside...tourmaline is said to strengthen the body as well as the spirit...it is also one of the October birthstones.
 
 
 
...a natural watermelon tourmaline slice measuring 10mm x 12mm is bezel-set into a shield lariat presentation...pendant drop is 1.5"...all this goodness hangs from a 17" sterling cable chain that closes with my handmade clasp. My maker's mark and .925 are both stamped on the backside.
 


All sterling silver components.

name: HOLLY Sterling Silver 14k Gold Pink Sapphire Necklace
description: The HOLLY necklace is made from scratch with a gorgeous 4-carat pink Sapphire set into satin-finished sterling silver and embellished with 14k gold accents. The pendant drop is  and hangs from an 18 sterling cable chain that closes in the front with a 14k gold hook.

name: Sterling Silver Simple Oval Welo Opal Necklace October Birthstone
description:
...simply sublime in a straightforward presentation...
 
...kind of smashing, kind of stunning...one gorgeous 2-carat Welo Opal is set simply and cleanly into sterling silver...measuring 7/8" long including the bale....hangs from an 17" sterling cable chain and closes with my hand-forged clasp...
 
...polished to a buttery soft shine...
...built to last...
 
 
Welo Opals are from Ethiopia...mesmerizing like no other opal...they are "hydrophane opals" which is to say they are porous and if submerged in water for an extended period of time, some become transparent. Once they dry out, their color returns. Fascinating stone!

name: Sterling Silver & 14k Solid Gold Engraved Charm Necklace with Sapphire
description:
Don't stand your ground. DO surrender and say yes to all the things that have been growing in your heart for so, so long.
 
 
A sterling silver freeform tab is hand-engraved with a quote from Robert Holden:
 
"One new perception,
one fresh thought,
one act of surrender,
one change of heart,
one leap of faith,
can change your life forever."
 
The sterling pendant is accented with a hammered solid 14k gold ring. The 18" sterling silver rolo chain is interrupted briefly by a 3mm yellow Sapphire.
The sterling tab measures 1" long by 1/2" wide and garners a nice comfortable weight...
 
The whole deal closes with my handmade S clasp and is finished with a soft gray patina followed by a brush polishing to bring out the detail.
 
Made from scratch. Built to last.

Temporarily sold out. Ask about availability.

name: PAPER MOON Sterling Silver Blue Topaz Necklace
description:
...simply cerulean in a straightforward presentation...
 
...kind of smashing, kind of stunning...one gorgeous 3.47ct rose-cut rectangular London Blue Topaz is set simply and cleanly onto a freeform rectangle of sterling silver...measuring 3/4" long including the bale....hangs from an 18" sterling cable chain and closes with my hand-forged clasp...
 
...polished to a buttery soft shine...
...built to last...

name: CORTEZ Sterling Silver Necklace with Fossilized Sand Dollar and Freshwater Pearl
description:
I truly love this little fossilized Sand Dollar...pulled from the Sea of Cortez as is, unpolished...texture you can see and feel...set simply into sterling silver, serving as an homage to it's creator...the great imperfect but really just so perfect...earth. Adorned with an offset "barnacle"...a 4mm freshwater pearl..the pendant is just shy of 3/4" long...hangs from an 18" sterling chain...

...made from scratch using all sterling components...

...built to last...

MADE TO ORDER. Ships within 2 weeks.

name: ADORATION Sterling Silver 14k Gold Pearl Hand Engraved Amulet Long Necklace
description:
"I love you. I adore you. What more do you wish?"



...translated from the French saying, "Je vous aime, je vous adore, que voulez-vous encore?"



Oh, that darn current and its unwillingness to flow in both directions...piss on it, I say. I decided a long time ago that my heart can get me into a lot of trouble by choosing to love the most unlikely people, and as a result I regard it with a fair amount of suspicion. But love, even unreciprocated and bearing the collective heft of lust and adoration can be so damn much fun; who could really give it up? So go on and answer the question...what more do you wish?



The ADORATION necklace is handcrafted from scratch of sterling silver and 14k solid gold. The design is hollow-form and it is hand-engraved with the French saying, "I love you. I adore you. What more do you wish?" It's crowned with a gorgeous thick-nacred creamy white 10mm freshwater pearl and has a molten bubble of solid 14k gold on the top side. The pendant measures 1.5" long from the top of the loop to the bottom of the stone and is just a shot shy of 3/4" in diameter. Hangs from a substantial 26" sterling chain and garners a nice weight--this is a quality piece of jewelry meant to be handed down. The chain closes with my handmade clasp that bears my maker's mark. The entire piece has been finished with a soft gray patina to highlight the engraving, followed by a brush polishing.  

Made from scratch.

Built to last.

name: Sterling Silver Blue Sapphire Organic Freeform Earrings
description:
...freeform-shaped sterling silver base plates are crowned with gorgeous deep blue natural Sapphires...

...precious gems in an organic shape...made 100% from scratch...

...they measure 3/8" long from the bottom of my french hooks...

...polished to a bright shiny finish...

...built to last...

name: DIVINE VOICE Sterling Silver Necklace with Hand Engraved Quote Madeira Citrine
description:
...sinous slab of sterling coaxed into a freeform shape and embellished with a gorgeous Madeira Citrine briolette and a wee heat-induced orb of 18k gold...

...2" by 1/2" hand-engraved with the powerful words of Sue Monk Kidd:

"My ultimate authority is the Divine voice in my own soul. Period."

...hangs from an 18" sterling chain and closes with my handmade clasp...

...all sterling and solid gold elements, built to last...

name: WILD VIOLETS Sterling Silver and 14k Gold Amethyst Temple Necklace
description:
The Wild Violets necklace is composed of sterling silver, 14k gold, and amethyst. A gaze-grabbing neck nuzzler, for sure.

Meant to be worn by a girl who is somewhat of a wild violet herself. Not too demure, that is.

Wild hearted. Deeply rooted. Totally herself. 

A 9.12 carat rose-cut color-change amethyst is set into sterling silver and embellished with a single 14k gold heat-induced orb. 100% hand-fabricated from scratch.

The color-change amethyst reflects three different shades when turned in the light: plummy purple, tanzanite violet, and fuchsia pink. Absolutely gorgeous! 

All this goodness hangs from an 18" sterling silver chain.

The pendant measures 5/8" wide and 1" long including the loop bail.

Built to last.
